message: #AxonM The M is for Multitasking.

“In 2018, we will focus more on core businesses and continuous innovation, firmly executing and delivering the Strategy 2020, to reward employees, customers, partners and investors with a better performance.” YIN Yimin, Chairman of ZTE Read more http://bit.ly/2DW7nSa
It’s the most wonderful time of the year, so we hope your #Christmas is filled with love, laughter and magic.

We just held a joint conference for the Full Service Access Networks (FSAN) and ITU-T SG15 Q2 in #Shanghai. Consensus has been reached to formulate a unified protocol-layer standard for PON technologies with speeds higher than 10G. http://bit.ly/2Dsq5k7

We are proud to announce the first implementable 5G NR specification was just completed in Lisbon, enabling cost-effective and full-scale 5G NR development as early as in 2019. ZTE as a contributor commits to accelerating 5G NR trials and deployment with fellow players. http://bit.ly/2BJpCK9
ZTE just signed a strategic partnership with Saudi Electricity Company to boost collaborations. #SaudiArabia

ZTE has been selected by China Telecom in the provincial cloud resource pool pre-commercial trial Software Defined Network (SDN) project, assisting the company to implement enterprise transformation while bringing significant economic benefits. http://bit.ly/2oDcB1y

ZTE handed over the maintenance of vSDM platform to Banglalink, six months after the successful migration of 60 million users from legacy HLR to the platform in Bangladesh which marks a significant milestone in digital transformation. http://bit.ly/2CD1JD3

We are honored to sponsor the 7th Saudi Arabia Smart Grid Conference and give a presentation on ‘Video Analysis, AMI Solution, BN and Cloud Terminal Solution’ in the exhibition themed ‘Smart Grid, Digital Transformation’.

Japan’s SoftBank Hawks have won the 2017Japan Series. Ahead of the match, SoftBank worked with ZTE to deploy Pre5G Massive MIMO 2.0 solution which saw SoftBank overcome communication challenges and build a smart and high-performance gym network. http://bit.ly/2kvCmeX

ZTE and velcom, part of A1 Telekom Austria Group, have deployed the first scaled commercial Narrowband IoT(NB-IoT) network in Belarus. The achievement signifies ZTE’s capabilities in providing operators with a smooth evolution solution towards 5G. http://bit.ly/2jWv98h

We just released a new generation of ZTE's ThingxCloud IoT platform products in Shanghai IoT summit. It features great capabilities of enabling IoT and IoT Ecology development, and opening a co-construction, co-sharing and win-win situation in IoT arena. http://bit.ly/2BVrsX6
As we are getting ready for another exciting year, let's look back at a recap from #MWC17 and check out some of our great achievements on #5G innovations: http://bit.ly/2js2qeC

ZTE has passed the acceptance test for China Mobile’s Hohhot SDN Project. The success in the test of the world’s largest private cloud based on OpenStack architecture verifies the openness and superiority of ZTE’s SDN vDC solution. http://bit.ly/2nFT7ca

Breakthrough: ZTE has completed testing for a high-precision time source device at the National Time Service Center, Chinese Academy of Sciences. The test saw astronomical navigation tech used for the first time in the communications industry, boosting IoE in 5G. http://bit.ly/2BWqvOT

At the 4th World Internet Conference, ZTE and China Mobile showcased their latest 5G eMBB application with a live HD panoramic video from a cruise ship, bringing viewers video of the Wuzhen Water Town in real time.
Zhang Zhenhui, ZTE’s EVP, attended the 4th World Internet Conference in Wuzhen, China, sharing about how ZTE supports the development of Digital Silk Road under One Belt One Road as a pioneer in 5G.

Zhao Xianming, president of ZTE Corporation, was recently invited to China Mobile Global Partners Conference 2017 and delivered a speech titled "5G Helps the Transformation of Vertical Industries towards Intelligence – Open, Smart, and Win-Win". Check out the video: https://youtu.be/sWNVd5THr1M

ZTE’s innovative Combo PON solution and Smart Parking System wins two innovation awards at the World Communication Awards 2017, a great testimony for ZTE's achievements in the optical access and IoT fields. http://bit.ly/2i6EkSu
ZTE and China Mobile sign a Strategic Agreement during China Mobile Global Partners Conference 2017 to build a healthy ecosystem and #sustainable industry. http://bit.ly/2jBYGmL

ZTE will work with China Unicom to provide IP-based Multimedia Services (IMS) in China. ZTE IMS fully enhances user experience, and supports smooth evolution to a 5G network in the future. http://bit.ly/2AGlPPO
ZTE today released the industry's first vBRAS solution at the China Mobile Global Partner Conference 2017 supporting 10 million users’ access simultaneously!  http://bit.ly/2jSmRRQ
Happy Thanksgiving! Hope your day is filled with food and joy!

ZTE unveiled six major 5G services at China Mobile Global Partners Conference 2017. The services revealed at the conference include 5G, Internet of Things (IoT), smart home, smart education, big video, and terminal services. http://bit.ly/2zZ60mm

ZTE are committed to standardization development and the implementation of Edge/Fog computing technologies so we’re delighted we’re vice chair of the newly formed IEEE 1934 Working Group. http://bit.ly/2iIZFSm

ZTE is committed to helping carriers deploy the latest innovations, so we have provided our 5th generation mobile communication system (5G) base stations and core network equipment to Japan’s SoftBank for a 4.5GHz band experiment. http://bit.ly/2Bcnvhe

We are supporting Open Network Automation Platform (ONAP) project’s first code release, called ONAP Amsterdam, in pushing the industry’s 5G-oriented transformation of telco service automation system forward. http://bit.ly/2iAm18z

We’re thrilled we won “Fixed Broadband Innovation of the Year” with our flagship optical access platform TITAN. The annual Telecom Asia Readers' Choice & Innovation Awards recognize major technological innovations in Asia Pacific. http://bit.ly/2zPqc84

We are now partnering with Sri Lanka Telecom, the largest wireless broadband operator in Sri Lanka, to complete a PoC verification test for LTE-A Pro in Colombo. ZTE’s eWBB enables more Sri Lankans to access the mobile Internet. http://bit.ly/2hDuFCD
Christian Laque, CTO of Velcom, shares with us the successful experience of the world's 1st complete range of virtualized core network. Watch more:

ZTE, China Mobile and Qualcomm have showcased their tech leadership capabilities with the world’s first end-to-end 5G NR interoperable system based on 3GPP standard. This new system will support the ever emerging mobile broadband experiences. http://bit.ly/2zP0dh2

ZTE and TMM have announced the commercial application of a beyond 100G optical transport network in Mexico. The network features ZTE’s star-product ZXONE 9700, the new-gen E-OTN device. http://bit.ly/2hxC32j

As President Abraham Lincoln said: "The best way to predict the future is to create it!" In the 5G field, ZTE would rather influence and even create the future than just predict it - find out more here: http://bit.ly/2zHXR5I

The arrival of Typhoon Damrey didn’t blow APEC off course thanks to ZTE’s rapid response relief team. The typhoon blasted Vietnam's south-central coast, but ZTE’s team worked around the clock to ensure communications were up and running.
What’s trending in Digital Transformation? CTO of SDN/NFV, ZTE introduces how full cloudification could bring real benefits to operators:
ZTE was the partner sponsor at Broadband World Forum 2017 in Berlin: we were proud to share our insights and innovative solutions to help operators prepare for the coming 5G era. Watch highlights:

Every year ZTE’s Wireless & Services User Congress connects ZTE with its customers. On Oct. 19 & 20 in Brussels, leading operators, partners, consulting firms, and open-source communities exchanged info on wireless network construction, operation, maintenance and worked together to create more value for users. Watch highlights:

To help Germany become a gigabit society, we’re joining forces with BBV and Bouwfonds to close existing supply gaps in largely undersupplied regions by building future-proof, high-performance networks. http://bit.ly/2zFfjs2

At the OpenStack Summit in Sydney, Lu Guanghui, Chief Architect of ZTE NFV, said that in the new 5G era, telcos need the intelligence, convergence and high-speed offered by 3 in 1 cloud infrastructure. http://bit.ly/2hOhVt7

ZTE released TECS 6.0, the new-generation Cloud Platform, at the OpenStack Summit in Sydney. As a gold member and major contributor of OpenStack Foundation, we are committed to promoting the evolution of OpenStack. http://bit.ly/2hio8Ro

With continuous investment in R&D and continued innovation, ZTE has been playing a leading role in the global telecommunications industry. This year we are ranked 2nd among Chinese Enterprises in the 2017 Global Innovation 1000! http://bit.ly/2j6wCLB
Foldable. Dual Screens. True Multitasking. #AxonM has it all. Watch how we change the way you interact with the world. @ztedevice
Watch to witness the whole new side reveals! The #AxonM changes the way we interact with the world.
You may have wondered, but now it’s revealed! Watch how ZTE converges IT application with telecoms.

Have you ever wondered what would a tech version of Dakar Rally be like? Come check this out and see how TITAN, our flagship Optical Access Platform designed for the next decade, wins the championship of the “Big BroadBand” Rally!

We successfully completed phase-1 5G transport test in cooperation with Telefonica in Spain. Result was very positive! It marks the two parties have been standing at the forefront of 5G industry chain. http://bit.ly/2hwaLtB

We are now the exclusive supplier of beyond 100g OTN project for Telefonica Mexico Movistar, the second largest mobile operator in Mexico! Our solutions will address the transport network construction requirements of TMM in five to ten years. http://bit.ly/2A3KTge
It’s only a little while under one of our favourite holidays: Halloween! What are you going to dress up as?

We recently supported webe digital Sdn Bhd (webe), a Malaysian mobile operator, on deployment of a virtual Evolved Packet Core (vEPC) network. The collaboration indicates that both parties have entered into a new phase of virtualization. http://bit.ly/2zTnKfu

At the ZTE Wireless & Services User Congress 2017 in Brussels we launched a total solution designed to accelerate the Pre5G evolution for 5G-ready networks, allowing existing 4G subscribers to experience 5G-like services. http://bit.ly/2gNPxGS

At ZTE’s Fixed Network User Conference, 20+ global operators discussed the future of fixed networks while ZTE showcased its next-generation broadband solutions. @NetCologne and @OpenFiberIT also shared how the company is helping them deliver network solutions across Germany and Italy.

ZTE has helped layout the ground rules for a Beyond-100G optical transmission ecosystem. The company has edited the Flex Coherent DWDM Framework for Optical Internetworking Forum (OIF) and had all the content unanimously approved. http://bit.ly/2gMYjoj
“WE LOVE ZTE” Summer Camp for Global Sales & Services Local Employees. Check out what they had to say about this incredible experience!
ZTE unveils its magic weapons. At BBWF 2017, ZTE next-generation network infrastructure FlexTransport shows how it holds the “Cloud”
With this first FDD Massive MIMO test in Europe, ZTE and Telenet enshrine partnership in 5G innovation. Watch now:

ZTE’s strong year continues: we’ve reported net profit of RMB3.905 billion, a 36.58% surge for the first three quarters. We’d like to thank our team and all our customers for their amazing support. http://bit.ly/2i68Vz0

ZTE thinks big: we want to lead the way to the Gigabit Society in Germany and Europe. Speaking at the World Broadband Forum in Germany, ZTE announced its investment in the research and development of 5G. http://bit.ly/2lgvZjg

ZTE has signed a framework agreement with Algerie Telecom to jointly build a full-service GPON FTTx network. The project will enable the operator to upgrade its business model by offering more innovative and customized services. http://bit.ly/2y4AxKX
ZTE and Orange Group are working together to bring the 5G era nearer. Teams from both companies will work together on 5G and related use cases in order to foster 5G innovation http://bit.ly/2gGxRjN
ZTE is committed to becoming a global 5G pioneer which is why we are partnering with Italian companies Wind Tre and Open Fiber to build Europe's first 5G pre-commercial network. http://bit.ly/2ldVlye
We just signed a 100G WDM Backbone Network Project Contract with Idea cellular, the third largest mobile operator in India. http://bit.ly/2iwN8o9

We launched our flagship 10 Gbps home router!  We aim to provide home users with symmetrical speeds of up to 10Gbps and to deliver highly stable and efficient wireless coverage. By June 2017, our broadband CPE devices have been deployed worldwide! #BBWF2017 http://bit.ly/2zzjHoB

At the ZTE Wireless & Services User Congress 2017, IHS analyst Michael Howard described how SDN/NFV is the key of 5G network innovation. Cloud ServCore, ZTE’s service-oriented 5G Cloud Native solution, leverages flexible modularized architecture.
ZTE is building 5G with more powerful innovation. Bai Gang, GM of ZTE 5G Products, explains how 5G changes our society.

At BBWF 2017, ZTE will showcase its insights and latest innovative solutions to help tackle the challenges of future proofing networks and monetizing high speeds in the coming 5G era! http://bit.ly/2xT2FFy

ZTE is now a gold member of Cloud Native Computing Foundation. The news, announced at the ZTE Wireless & Services User Congress 2017 in Belgium, is recognition of ZTE’s participation in the global open source technology ecosystem. http://bit.ly/2zoz82D

ZTE launched its new Digital-Ops Solution at the ZTE Wireless & Services User Congress 2017 on October 20th in Brussels. This solution drives the digital transformation by value by confronting challenges caused by network transformation and reconfiguration. http://bit.ly/2yASuTj
ZTE holds Wireless & Services User Congress 2017 in Belgium, sharing innovative achievements as a 5G pioneer.

We’ve worked with Telenet Belgium to carry out the first FDD Massive MIMO field application in Europe. This new tech does not require changes to 4G network architecture and brings immediate commercial benefits while boosting customer experience. http://bit.ly/2gsJmLM
ZTE published guidance for a 36.58% increase in net profit for the nine months ended Sept 30 2017. The net profit is estimated to be RMB 4.3-4.8 billion for the whole year.  http://bit.ly/2ySwdDp

ZTE have announced a new strategic partnership with e-commerce platform JD.com. The two companies will jointly pursue opportunities for the 5G era and create more innovative mobile devices and experiences for consumers. http://bit.ly/2zhTVVS

ZTE helps India on 5G commercialization by signing a MoU on 5G and IoT with BSNL, the largest Indian state-owned operator at IMC India.They agree to co-evaluate and verify multiple key 5G technologies. http://bit.ly/2kU7h8t
We are launching a new product! Come join us on our LIVE stream on following platforms at EST 10am Oct 17 to find out more details! #ZTEAXON
5.0 revolution is about to begin: tangible proof is the sign-off of a partnership between the University of l’Aquila and ZTE Italy, for the establishment of a Joint Innovation Center.
Join us at ZTE Wireless & Services User Congress 2017 and work together to bring more value to users with more competitive solutions! More on http://bit.ly/2wRfziH
Are you ready for unlimited potential? See what's got everyone so surprised when we reveal the must-have device of the year. 10.17.17.
“ZTE uses the new type of customized network slicing technology to meet the complex and diversified end-to-end network provisioning demands” He Wei at #SDN/NFV World Congress 2017
ZTE Carrier DevOps Builder wins ’Best New Orchestration and Control’ Award at #SDN NFV World Congress. It’s the world’s first commercial carrier DevOps environment! Read more http://bit.ly/2i44yIu
ZTE debuts a Joint Training Center with Tor Vergata University on managerial training for global ICT talents. An attribution to ZTE University global network that comprises 15 global centers.
Everything will be changed. A whole new side awaits. 10.17.17
ZTE dedicates to save energy and reduce emission by signing the Circular Manifest with six key KPN suppliers in Den Haag, the Netherlands. Read more http://bit.ly/2kATD9Q
ZTE is showcasing at SDN NFV World Congress 2017 its most exciting 5G oriented technologies and Carrier DevOps-based Network Slice. Join us at B3 ZTE Booth World Forum to set out a fantastic journey!

ZTE,Turksat release a new HD Hybrid STB featuring BCM high-performance chipset, Live TV recording, time shift TV, PIP, OTT VOD, voice search and control, bringing vivid precise pictures , immersive audios and superb user experience! http://bit.ly/2yakCOj
Everything is not what it seems. Big changes are coming this October. Watch this space. http://bit.ly/2xYkUJ3

ZTE shines in Telenet's new Innovation Center with its innovative equipment and live Smart Parking demo. The two parties will co-prepare the launch of 5G and bring technologies together to offer amazing customer experiences. http://bit.ly/2gdYRUs

Love golf? We do. That's why we've signed a three-year agreement to become the PGA TOUR's first-ever Official Smartphone. The deal allows us to connect directly with golf fans around the world. http://bit.ly/2yrerqE
